name: Unown I
author: CR CG gangs
flavor_text: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

abilities.name: [Increase]
abilities.effect: When you play Unown I from your hand, you may search your deck for a card with Unown in its name and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can’t use this power if your Bench is full.

rule_box: You may have up to 4 Basic Pokémon cards in your deck with Unown in their names.
